Judul: VALUATIONOFBANK SYARIAH MANDIRI FOR THE PURPOSE OF ITS CAPITAL RESTRUCTURING
Abstrak:
PT. Bank Syariah Mandiri (Bank Syariah Mandiri) had desire to expand its services with assets targets on year 2015 of Rp. 190 Trillion. Furthermore, with high assets growth, minimum CAR on year 2010 and market potency for syariah based banking, it makesBank Syariah Mandiri need more capital. With thereÃ‚Â’s plan from Indonesia Central Bank to issue new regulation to limit bank ownership to improve public control on banks, capital restructuring for Bank Syariah Mandiri become important.    
 
 
 

Capital restructuring is a process of change in company source of capital. In general there is three source of capital. First is Internal, second is from sukukand last is from public offering. Bank Mandirias holding company not have the freedom to inject capital needs by Bank Syariah Mandiri to support its growth due to, Bank Mandiri have many subsidiaries that needs capital from it, the company needs the capital for its own growth. Another way to gain capital is Bank Syariah Mandiri to issue sukuk, but there is regulation to limit the sukuk issuance. Ergo, to achieve its medium term target IPO alternative become importing.    
 
 
 

The uncertainty of Bank Mandiri to injected capital to support its growth due to Bank Mandiri is also needs the capital and restriction on issuing sukuk. Public offering becomes alternative to be considered by Bank Syariah Mandiri to gain capital and due to upcoming regulation to restrict bank ownership, public offering become importing solution to be considered.    
 
 
 

To valuated the Bank Syariah Mandiri economic value we used asset, market and fundamental valuation. The asset based we used liquidation and book value valuation model. The market based we benchmark the company with bank that have simmiliar equity, and in the fundamental we used discounted cash flow and earnings as cash flow valuation. the two of fundamental valuation we used as compared tool as we believe that the right way to valuated bank is earnings as cash flow because itÃ‚Â’s the most appropriated for banks fundamental valuation due to its characteristics.    
 
 
 

This final project have purpose to give Bank Mandiri, Bank Syariah Mandiri and public the insight about the needs of Bank Syariah Mandiri needs to restructured its capital, this final project will used discounted cash flow method, book value and market analysis to valuated the economic value of Bank Syariah Mandiri. Internal and external analysis is included to analyze market conditions.    
 
 
 

Based on our analysis, Bank Syariah Mandirihas economic value of Rp. 9.7 Trillion and should go for IPO with issuing a quarter of its ownership or equal to Rp. 2.4 Trillion with stock split to 5 Billion share or Rp. 1,945/share, the stock splitdue to targetinginvestors not only an entity but for personal investors.
